short_summary: Engineering Services for a Dynamic River Environment and Drafting/Illustration Services for the Big Bar Landslide Response. Estimated quantity of commodity: 1 senior Professional Engineer, 1 junior Engineering Graduate, and 1 senior Draftsperson/Illustrator (5.4, 5.3, and 5.1). Duration of contract: April 24, 2023 to April 30, 2026. Delivery timespan: April 24, 2023 to April 30, 2026
description: This proposal is open only to suppliers who have a pre-qualifying arrangement under the Fish Projects and Harbours service categories 5. Technical, Engineering and Maintenance Services Stream. For those who fit the criteria, a brief contract description and tender timelines.
tags: Technical, Engineering and Maintenance Services Stream
full_summary:
_____________________

Title: Engineering Services for a Dynamic River Environment and Drafting/Illustration Services
_____________________________________________________

Tender Number: cb-4492-52708072
-----------------------------------------------------

**Competition Status**
The notice of proposed procurement has expired.

**Background**
This tender replaces a previous bid solicitation (30003611) dated March 9, 2023, which closed on March 24, 2023.

**Project Overview**
The Big Bar Landslide Response, led by Fisheries and Oceans Canada, involves remediating the impact of a landslide on the Fraser River, approximately 100 km north of Lillooet, BC. The team requires ongoing monitoring of hydraulic conditions and engineering support to establish a long-term solution for fish passage at the slide site.

**Required Services**

* Senior Professional Engineer
* Junior Engineering Graduate
* Senior Draftsperson/Illustrator

**Contract Duration**
From contract award to April 30, 2026

**Deliverables**
The successful contractor will provide services and support to the project from contract award to April 30, 2026.

**Participation Requirements**

* This tender is open only to those suppliers who are Agreement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS and are qualified under Tier 1 for the Technical, Engineering and Maintenance Services Stream (5. Technical, Engineering and Maintenance Services).
* Suppliers must be SA-holders or have been added to the TSPS SA by PSPC's SA Authority at least one week prior to the tender closing date.

**Contact Information**

* Name: Richard Soulliere
* Email: DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 576-2873

**Important Dates**

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-12T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-04-24
* Expected Contract End Date: 2026-04-30

**Trade Agreements**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (
